Title: Provides relief on statewide central register clearance fees for tax exempt organizations
Summary: Provides relief on statewide central registrar clearance fees for tax exempt organizations and that the fee of twenty-five dollars shall not apply to tax-exempt not-for-profit child care providers registered as a federal 501 c(3) charitable organization.
LawCode: Amd ยง424-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing relief on statewide central register clearance fees for tax exempt organizations
